file_content.text: Is it safe to explore Sith ruins? There may be traps or I don't know....
You misunderstand, Padawan. The early settlers of Tython knew only the Force.
Some explored the light side, and others, the dark. Jedi and Sith did not yet exist.
But the dark side is here, Master. I feel it.
And that is why we train here, among friends.
